author: Alex Ribeiro-Castro
title: AI could be key to tackling future global health crises
description: Artificial Intelligence has played a big role throughout the COVID-19 pandemic
content: We are currently facing one of the greatest challenges in a generation, which has brought life as we know it to a halt. COVID-19 has infected hundreds of thousands of people, tragically taken the lives of many, and continues to spread at an alarming rate. It … [+6850 chars]
